name: Orbimesh Image Analysis Agent
description: Analyzes image files to answer questions about their content using Groq's LLaMA 4 vision model.

endpoints.description: Analyze an image and answer questions about it. Use for 'What is in this image?', 'Describe this picture', 'Extract text from this screenshot', 'Identify objects in this photo'.

parameters.name: image_path
parameters.description: Local server path to the image file.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Question about the image (e.g., 'What is in this image?').
